subject: Doping (Sports)
Bicycles and Bicycling
lead_paragraph: The American cyclist Philip Zajicek has been barred for life by the U.S. Anti-Doping Agency after a string of offenses, including importing banned drugs.
snippet: The American cyclist Philip Zajicek has been barred for life by the U.S. Anti-Doping Agency after a string of offenses, including importing banned drugs.
